abstract: Representative Dennis Cardoza's comments highlighted what Democrats perceive as a "lack of urgency" in the Obama administration and federal agencies' efforts to revive the housing market.
snippet: Representative Dennis Cardoza's comments highlighted what Democrats perceive as a "lack of urgency" in the Obama administration and federal agencies' efforts to revive the housing market.
lead_paragraph: With his rebuke Thursday of President Obama's handling of the housing crisis, Representative Dennis Cardoza of California joined an increasingly vocal chorus of House Democrats criticizing the president's efforts.

headline.main: Housing Comments Echo Democrats Worries About Obama's Plans
